description: New York Electricity Sales dataset provides data on total electricity requirements for New York State.  Electricity sales to ultimate consumers are provided and are broken down by sector (Residential/Commercial/Industrial/Transportation) in GWh.

metadata.attribution: New York State Energy Research and Development Authority
metadata.description: New York Electricity Sales dataset provides data on total electricity requirements for New York State.  Electricity sales to ultimate consumers are provided and are broken down by sector (Residential/Commercial/Industrial/Transportation) in GWh.

name: Electricity Sales By Sector, GWh: Beginning 1980
